page.title: 11Headmasters Interview cont.
page.content: areas means parents have to transport children to and from friend's houses. {How far is the pattern of school {life affected by being in the country? The children have to travel to Newent School which has a swimmingpool.This leaves little time for swimming.There is no chance of joining any clubs because public transport is so poor. Since transport is poor we cannot do anything to do with towns such as urban studies.There are no ethnic minorities at this school.There never has been a child from another race attending this school. {How much community activity is {there?}There are brownies,cubs,guides, scouts,women's institute,British Legion,cricket and football teams, tennis club,a playgroup,toddler group, many activities involving the church such as harvest suppers,village fetes
